text: annalil, paluttik kontirukkum ovvoru tayum tan uttum kulantaiyai marantu vituvataiyum, ovvoru karppiniyum tan cumaiyai inru vituvataiyum ninkal kanpirkal; melum, manitarkalai mati mayankiyavarkalaka irukka kanpir; eninum (atu matuvinal erpatta) mati mayakkamalla anal allahvin vetanai mikak katumaiyanatakum
